title: Clocked out on the Cruise
description: Given the horror of yet another murder on yet another getaway, the Detective decided to go for another getaway, this time getting away from the apprarently cursed land. Unfortunately, his last minute booking on a late-season cruise turned out to have an early departure and a prematurely departed. The Detective was not happy to be awoken early by screams and a knocking at his door asking him to investigate.

personList.name: Captain Crisp
personList.description: He likes crisp salty air and suspiciously sweet breakfasts. Ideally at the same time on a precarious deck.
personList.statement: I saw Sous-Chef Sam with a Suspicious Gas

personList.name: Tourist Tony
personList.description: An incredibly athletic man who seems oddly proteective of his luggage. Supposedly he's here for a convention being held on board, though he won't say which one.
personList.statement: I did not bring a Faux Cat Tail.

personList.name: Sous-Chef Sam
personList.description: This long-nosed man is world-renowned for his fruit donuts. Though, anyone who has said they all taste identical has been known to turn up... silenced.
personList.statement: I was in the Dining Room

locationList.name: Walking Deck
locationList.description: It's a long way down to the water. Thankfully that rail will definitely keep you from falling overboard.

locationList.name: Pool
locationList.description: Water, water, everywhere, but these drops are completely safe to swim in. As long as you completely ignore the caution signs.

locationList.name: Dining Room
locationList.description: They say your last meal here is the best.

weaponList.name: Faux Cat Tail
weaponList.description: This orange and black striped tail looks like part of a costume.

weaponList.name: Suspicious Gas
weaponList.description: It smells oddly fruity. Up to the point your lungs start foaming at least.

weaponList.name: Box of Razors
weaponList.description: For some reason, these oddly sharp objects are in a colorful, cardboard box.

cluesList: Captain Crisp was annoyed with the person at the pool
A Box of Razors was not in the dining room

resolution.resolutionText: Tourist Tony growled as he was led away. "My boys will get you someday, Detective. They're grreat!" The Detective hoped to never meet Tourist Tony's boys, especially if they shared the interest he'd been hiding in his luggage. The Detective was gonna need a drink after all this.
